subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Adam Morrison, Matt Carroll and Gerald Wallace each scored 19 points and the Charlotte Bobcats, without their sick coach, beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 102-87, last night for their team-record-tying fourth consecutive victory.
snippet: Adam Morrison, Matt Carroll and Gerald Wallace each scored 19 points and the Charlotte Bobcats, without their sick coach, beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 102-87, last night for their team-record-tying fourth consecutive victory.
